text: Allakh poka ostavil oprovergayushchikh istinu s ikh durnymi zamyslami protiv prizyva, chtoby podvergat' lyudey ispytaniyu. Nechestivtsy, u kotorykh serdtsa okameneli, litsemery, u kotorykh serdtsa ogrubeli, budut yeshcho bol'she uglublyat'sya v zabluzhdeniye, rasprostranyaya somneniya o prizyve k Istine Allakha. Ne udivitel'no, chto eti nevernyye postupayut tak. Ved' oni - v glubokom zabluzhdenii i raskole
